title: A Place Called Home
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 48 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 210L
description: Help students begin to understand how a room in a house is part of the larger world with A Place Called Home. Illustrations, simple sentences, and high-frequency words support early emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to identify main idea and details as well as to connect to prior knowledge as they read this interesting story.
meta: city, country, home, state, street, world
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
